title: Interprofessional Workshop for Reducing Stigma of Substance Use Disorder (SUD)

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on enhancing practical competencies for healthcare professionals to address stigma issues in the treatment of patients with medication use disorders.

learning_goals: Participants reduce the social distance index toward SUD patients by 20% or more compared to pre-assessment.
Participants can explain the causes and consequences of SUD stigma with 80% or higher accuracy.
Participants practice effective interaction strategies with SUD patients through VR simulation at least three times.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
